The lookouts are dark blotches on a horizon of sand; vigilant hawks against the horrors of the desert.
A column of gleaming bone holds a stern and ominous watch over the shifting and treacherous Nehekharan sands.
The heat-bleached bone warriors of grim countenance watch over the battlements, watching for foes through hollowed sockets.
These lithified walls have seen empires rise and fall, and endured the accession of doom. They hold.
The hieroglyphics inscribed upon these battlements channel protective wards, fending off any would-be invaders.

Vargheists are the darkness within a Vampire's soul made manifest.
Terrorgheist are the largest and most ferocious bat species to have ever existed, so large and terrifying that they've grown to the size of Dragons.
This dark nexus houses the foulest creatures.
Ever growing in power, ethereal spirits are drawn from the Underworld.
Do not defy the will and fate of the Death God.

Be wary of the Undead bearing projectiles.

Infernal flames and incantations spread the taint of undeath.
Hellfire and unholy flames spread the taint of undeath ever onwards.
